sourcesContent:
export type Language = 'en' | 'zh';

export const translations = {
  en: {
    // Common
    cancel: 'Cancel',
    save: 'Save',
    delete: 'Delete',
    edit: 'Edit',
    create: 'Create',
    run: 'Run',
    clone: 'Clone',
    loading: 'Loading...',
    error: 'Error',
    success: 'Success',
    confirm: 'Confirm',
    close: 'Close',
    add: 'Add',
    remove: 'Remove',
    search: 'Search',
    actions: 'Actions',
    settings: 'Settings',

    // Navigation
    dashboard: 'Dashboard',
    recipes: 'Recipes',
    executions: 'Executions',
    outputs: 'Outputs',
    standards: 'Company Standards',
    newRecipe: 'New Recipe',
    usage: 'API Usage',

    // Dashboard
    dashboardTitle: 'Dashboard',
    dashboardSubtitle: 'Create and manage your AI workflows',
    createNewRecipe: 'Create New Recipe',
    createNewTemplate: 'Create New Template',
    myTemplates: 'My Templates',
    templatesDescription: 'Single-task building blocks for your workflows',
    myRecipes: 'My Recipes',
    recipesDescription: 'Workflows that chain multiple templates together',
    templates: 'templates',
    noTemplatesYet: 'No templates yet. Create your first template to get started.',
    saveAsTemplate: 'Save as Template',
    isTemplate: 'Template',
    makeTemplate: 'Make this a template',
    templateDescription: 'Templates can be reused as starting points for new workflows',
    noRecipesYet: "You haven't created any recipes yet.",
    createFirstRecipe: 'Create Your First Recipe',
    recentExecutions: 'Recent Executions',
    noExecutionsYet: 'No workflow executions yet. Run a recipe to get started!',
    viewAll: 'View All',
    template: 'Template',
    steps: 'steps',
    noDescription: 'No description',

    // Recipe Builder
    createNewRecipeTitle: 'Create New Recipe',
    editRecipe: 'Edit Recipe',
    buildWorkflowStep: 'Build your AI workflow step by step',
    recipeDetails: 'Recipe Details',
    recipeName: 'Recipe Name',
    recipeNamePlaceholder: 'e.g., Product Listing Generator',
    description: 'Description',
    descriptionPlaceholder: 'Describe what this recipe does...',
    stepsTitle: 'Workflow Templates',
    addStep: 'Add Template',
    noStepsYet: 'No templates added yet. Add a template to build your workflow.',
    stepConfiguration: 'Template Configuration',
    stepName: 'Step Name',
    stepNamePlaceholder: 'e.g., Research Product',
    aiModel: 'AI Model',
    notConfigured: 'Not configured',
    promptTemplate: 'Prompt Template',
    promptTemplatePlaceholder: 'Enter your prompt template here. Use {{variable_name}} for variables.',
    promptTemplateHelp: 'Use {{variable_name}} for user inputs, {{step_N_output}} for previous step outputs',
    outputFormat: 'Output Format',
    plainText: 'Plain Text',
    markdown: 'Markdown',
    json: 'JSON',
    modelSettings: 'Model Settings',
    temperature: 'Temperature',
    maxTokens: 'Max Tokens',
    variableHelp: 'Variable Help',
    variableReference: 'Variable Reference',
    userInputVariables: 'User Input Variables',
    userInputVariablesDesc: 'to create input fields.',
    previousStepOutputs: 'Previous Step Outputs',
    previousStepOutputsDesc: 'Reference output from previous steps using',
    companyStandards: 'Company Standards',
    companyStandardsDesc: 'Inject your company standards into prompts.',
    selectStepToEdit: 'Select a step to edit or add a new step to get started.',
    recipeNameRequired: 'Recipe name is required',
    createRecipe: 'Create Recipe',
    saveChanges: 'Save Changes',
    selectTemplateStep: 'Add Template to Workflow',
    noTemplatesAvailable: 'No templates available. Create a template first.',
    selectTemplateDesc: 'Choose a template to add to your workflow. Each template handles a specific task.',
    requiredInputFields: 'Required Input Fields',
    requiredInputFieldsDesc: 'These input fields will be required when running this recipe, based on the variables used in the steps.',
    stepInputValues: 'Input Values',
    stepInputValuesDesc: 'Set default values for this step\'s input variables. These will be pre-filled when running the recipe.',
    enterDefaultValue: 'Enter default value...',

    // Template Editor
    editTemplate: 'Edit Template',
    templateEditorSubtitle: 'Define a single-task template with its AI configuration',
    templateNameRequired: 'Template name is required',
    promptTemplateRequired: 'Prompt template is required',
    createTemplate: 'Create Template',
    templateDetails: 'Template Details',
    templateName: 'Template Name',
    templateNamePlaceholder: 'e.g., Product Research, Amazon Listing Generator',
    templateDescriptionPlaceholder: 'Describe what this template does...',
    aiConfiguration: 'AI Configuration',
    templatePromptHelp: 'Use {{variable_name}} for inputs that will be provided when running a recipe',
    templateInputsDesc: 'These variables will become input fields when this template is used in a recipe.',
    templateVariableDesc: 'creates an input field for users to fill when running the recipe.',
    confirmDeleteTemplate: 'Are you sure you want to delete this template?',

    // Input Configuration
    inputConfiguration: 'Input Configuration',
    // Input type labels
    inputTypeText: 'Short Text',
    inputTypeTextarea: 'Long Text',
    inputTypeImage: 'Image Upload',
    inputTypeUrlList: 'URL List',
    inputTypeFile: 'File Upload',
    inputConfigurationDesc: 'Configure how each input variable should be collected when this template is used.',
    inputType: 'Input Type',
    fieldLabel: 'Field Label',
    placeholderText: 'Placeholder Text',
    placeholderExample: 'e.g., Enter product name...',
    helpText: 'Help Text',
    helpTextExample: 'Provide instructions or examples for this field',
    acceptedFileTypes: 'Accepted File Types',
    minUrls: 'Minimum URLs',
    maxUrls: 'Maximum URLs',
    maxImageSizeMB: 'Max Image Size (MB)',
    supportedInputTypes: 'Supported Input Types',
    variableSyntax: 'Variable Syntax',
    forImageUpload: 'for image analysis',
    forUrlList: 'for multiple product URLs',
    forFileUpload: 'for data file analysis',
    inputType_text_desc: 'Single line text input',
    inputType_textarea_desc: 'Multi-line text for longer content',
    inputType_image_desc: 'Upload images for AI analysis',
    inputType_url_list_desc: 'Multiple URLs for web content',
    inputType_file_desc: 'Upload files (CSV, Excel, etc.)',

    // Input Variables Management
    inputVariables: 'Input Variables',
    inputVariablesDesc: 'Define the input fields that users will fill when using this template',
